tag_list: socialparody-com, socialparadox-com, social, network, niche, communities, sean-brogna, wei-qi-yang, software, engineer, php, flash
overview:
Sean Brogna, Socialparody.com and Socialparadox.com founder has rich experience in administrating social network platforms and ready and willing to show others how to double their site exposure & increase revenue by 100% in a week or less by guided tips and industry secrets on how to prime your Social Parody Adult Site to become a profitable enterprise.

Sean Brogna’s forte is software conceptualization and development which in the last decade has taken him worldwide through a slue of East Asian Countries where he met and teamed up with Wei Qi Yang, a software engineer who specializes in Ruby on Rails, Flash and PHP. Together Both Wei Qi and Sean have launched several start ups, most recent http://www.socialparadox.com, a social network platform where members can create a niche community for anything non adult.

Plans are in the works to launch a rather unique live streaming cam site where members will have the tools and wares to monetize their broadcasts thus eliminating the need to use third party processors.
